objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A1A2E;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#4A4A8F;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#F8F8F8'/><g transform='translate(50, 100)'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='30' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.1)'/><circle cx='200' cy='150' r='50' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.1)'/><circle cx='100' cy='300' r='40' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.1)'/><circle cx='300' cy='400' r='60' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.1)'/></g><g transform='translate(900, 900)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='30' fill='rgba(26,26,46,0.05)'/><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='20' fill='rgba(26,26,46,0.05)'/><circle cx='-40' cy='30' r='25' fill='rgba(26,26,46,0.05)'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Seamless integration across all devices
• High-performance processors
• Perfect for professionals & creatives

product_details.name: Complete Apple Ecosystem Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Premium Apple MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Latest generation iPad with stunning edge-to-edge display
• iPhone with advanced camera system and Touch ID
• Seamless ecosystem integration across all devices
• High-performance processors for smooth multitasking
• Beautiful aluminum unibody construction across all devices
• macOS and iOS operating systems for optimal productivity
• Powerful connectivity features with AirDrop and Handoff
• Synchronized iCloud storage across all devices
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and power users
• All devices in pristine condition with latest software updates
• Complete package for ultimate productivity on-the-go

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a left-aligned vertical layout with a split background: a gradient blend of deep indigo and royal blue on the left and clean white on the right. The left portion showcases key text layers — a bold title (**heading**), a subtle subtitle (**subheading**), a feature description block (**description**), pricing info in a tech-inspired font (**price**), and a clean call-to-action button (**cta**, backed by **cta_background**). The right section is dominated by a product image (**product_image**) presenting a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone side-by-side. Decorative translucent circles add depth on both background sides.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Indigo: `#1A1A2E`
- Royal Blue: `#4A4A8F`
- Soft White: `#F8F8F8`
- Pale Blue Gray (text): `#B8C5E0`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases Apple devices—MacBook, iPad, and iPhone—highlighting a sleek, modern design. A refined color palette suitable for an advertisement banner includes: Space Gray (#8E8E93), Matte Black (#1C1C1E), Silver (#E5E5EA), Sky Blue (#A9CFF4), and Soft Pink (#EFBCBF). The MacBook carries a dominant silver metallic tone, complemented by the black keyboard, while the vivid screen exhibits soft pastels—lavenders, blush pinks, and warm oranges—blending seamlessly with the serenity of the landscape wallpaper. The iPad and iPhone follow a monochromatic, sleek tone, enhancing product harmony. This blend of metallics with muted naturals offers a tech-forward yet approachable feel.
